R4 TEST 


8 1s in each even slice, and 2 1â€™s in each odd slice.



00001 - RS1

R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 1000000000000001 at index  0 - 000
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  1 - 001
LI R1 with 1000000000000001 at index  2 - 010
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  3 - 011
LI R1 with 1000000000000001 at index  4 - 100
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  5 - 101
LI R1 with 1000000000000001 at index  6 - 110
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  7 - 111
 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100000011000000000100000 

program:

0000100000000000000100001  
0001000011110000111100001  
0010100000000000000100001

passes.
